effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
